Texts.Eng: If hung in an enclosed building with a door and a light, someone will move in and make it their home.
If placed in a building with a door and a light it will encourage someone to move in.
Observant. If placed in a correctly structured building, this colony deed will encourage someone to move in.
Place in an enclosed building with at least one door and light source and someone will move in!
Ssscreen to hang on building wall. Makes sssomeone move into home!
These are great for expanding a colony. Place it in a building with a door and a light and someone will move in.
This device will invite someone to move into the building. Just make sure there's a door and a light.
With a colony deed someone'll move into the building. Just make sure the building has a door an' a light source.
